author: Nick Green

review: I did my research on all of the streaming devices on the market and felt safest to trust Amazon. I absolutely love my Amazon Fire TV. I do not usually have much luck in setup or management of anything to do with the TV or remotes. I was a little nervous. I opened the instructions and to my surprise there were only three steps.  I was shocked when I just plugged it in and it worked! It was so simple! I think it took me more time to get it out of the box! I have Amazon Prime, Netflix and Hulu Plus. The menus and navigation are super simple and very user friendly. I am seriously considering getting rid of cable!! Highly recommend!
